GCD.Name: Hakaze
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5

GCD.Name: Jinpu
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.
Combo Action: Gyofu
Combo Potency: 320
Combo Bonus: Grants Fugetsu
Fugetsu Effect: Increases damage dealt by 13%
Duration: 40s
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5

GCD.Name: Enpi
GCD.Description:
Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 100.
Enhanced Enpi Bonus Potency: 270
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10

GCD.Name: Shifu
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.
Combo Action: Gyofu
Combo Potency: 320
Combo Bonus: Grants Fuka
Fuka Effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 13%
Duration: 40s
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5

GCD.Name: Fuga
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5

GCD.Name: Gekko
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 180.
230 when executed from a target's rear.
Combo Action: Jinpu
Combo Potency: 390
Rear Combo Potency: 440
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10
Combo Bonus: Grants Getsu

GCD.Name: Iaijutsu
GCD.Description: Executes a weaponskill depending on current number of Sen stored in Sen Gauge.</br>1 Sen: Higanbana</br>2 Sen: Tenka Goken</br>3 Sen: Midare Setsugekka</br>While under the effect of Tendo, Tenka Goken changes to Tendo Goken, and Midare Setsugekka changes to Tendo Setsugekka.

GCD.Name: Mangetsu
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Combo Action: Fuko
Combo Potency: 120
Combo Bonus: Grants Fugetsu
Fugetsu Effect: Increases damage dealt by 13%
Duration: 40s
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10
Combo Bonus: Grants Getsu

GCD.Name: Kasha
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 180.
230 when executed from a target's flank.
Combo Action: Shifu
Combo Potency: 390
Flank Combo Potency: 440
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10
Combo Bonus: Grants Ka

GCD.Name: Oka
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Combo Action: Fuko
Combo Potency: 120
Combo Bonus: Grants Fuka
Fuka Effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 13%
Duration: 40s
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10
Combo Bonus: Grants Ka

GCD.Name: Yukikaze
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 180.
Combo Action: Gyofu
Combo Potency: 360
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 15
Combo Bonus: Grants Setsu

GCD.Name: Tsubame-gaeshi
GCD.Description: Repeats the previously executed iaijutsu.</br>Cannot be used to repeat Higanbana.</br>Can only be executed immediately following Iaijutsu while under the effect of Tsubame-gaeshi Ready.

GCD.Name: Fuko
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10

GCD.Name: Ogi Namikiri
GCD.Description: Delivers a critical hit to all enemies in a cone before you with a potency of 900 for the first enemy, and 75% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Damage dealt is increased when under an effect that raises critical hit rate.</br>Grants a stack of Meditation, up to a maximum of 3.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Ogi Namikiri Ready.

GCD.Name: Kaeshi: Namikiri
GCD.Description: Delivers a critical hit to all enemies in a cone before you with a potency of 900 for the first enemy, and 75% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Damage dealt is increased when under an effect that raises critical hit rate.</br></br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Ogi Namikiri changes to Kaeshi: Namikiri when requirements for execution are met.

GCD.Name: Gyofu
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 240.
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5

OGCD.Name: Third Eye
OGCD.Description:
Reduces the amount of damage taken by the next attack by 10%.
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10 when hit

OGCD.Name: Meikyo Shisui
OGCD.Description:
Execute up to 3 weaponskill combos without meeting combo prerequisites. Does not affect Iaijutsu or Ogi Namikiri.
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: Successfully landing Gekko grants Fugetsu, and successfully landing Kasha grants Fuka
Additional Effect: Grants Tsubame-gaeshi Ready
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Grants Tendo
Duration: 30s
Maximum Charges: 2

OGCD.Name: Hissatsu: Shinten
OGCD.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 250.</br>Kenki Gauge Cost: 25

OGCD.Name: Hissatsu: Gyoten
OGCD.Description: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 100.</br>Kenki Gauge Cost: 10</br>Cannot be executed while bound.

OGCD.Name: Hissatsu: Yaten
OGCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: 10-yalm backstep
Additional Effect: Grants Enhanced Enpi
Duration: 15s
Kenki Gauge Cost: 10
Cannot be executed while bound.

OGCD.Name: Meditate
OGCD.Description:
Gradually increases your Kenki Gauge.
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Grants stacks of Meditation when used in combat, up to a maximum of 3
Kenki Gauge not affected when used outside battle.
Effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).
Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills upon execution. Cannot be executed during the cooldown of weaponskills.

OGCD.Name: Hissatsu: Kyuten
OGCD.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all nearby enemies.</br>Kenki Gauge Cost: 25

OGCD.Name: Hagakure
OGCD.Description: Converts Setsu, Getsu, and Ka into Kenki. Each Sen converted increases your Kenki Gauge by 10. Can only be executed if under the effect of at least one of the three statuses.

OGCD.Name: Ikishoten
OGCD.Description:
Increases Kenki Gauge by 50.
Additional Effect: Grants Ogi Namikiri Ready
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Grants Zanshin Ready
Duration: 30s
Can only be executed while in combat.

OGCD.Name: Hissatsu: Guren
OGCD.Description: Delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 500 for the first enemy, and 25% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Kenki Gauge Cost: 25</br>Shares a recast timer with Hissatsu: Senei.

OGCD.Name: Hissatsu: Senei
OGCD.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 860.</br>Kenki Gauge Cost: 25</br>Shares a recast timer with Hissatsu: Guren.

OGCD.Name: Shoha
OGCD.Description: Delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 640 for the first enemy, and 65% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Can only be executed after accumulating three stacks of Meditation by executing Iaijutsu, Meditate, or Ogi Namikiri while in combat.</br>Consumes all stacks of Meditation upon execution.

OGCD.Name: Tengetsu
OGCD.Description:
Reduces the amount of damage taken by the next attack by 10%.
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Grants Tengetsu's Foresight and increases Kenki Gauge by 10 when hit
Tengetsu's Foresight Effect: Restores HP when effect expires
Duration: 8s
Cure Potency: 500

OGCD.Name: Zanshin
OGCD.Description: Delivers an attack to all enemies in a cone before you with a potency of 900 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Kenki Gauge Cost: 50</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Zanshin Ready.
